name: Sanctuary

components.materialDescription: a shard of glass from a mirror

description: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw or choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. The spell doesn't protect the warded creature from area effects. If the warded creature makes an attack, casts a spell that affects an enemy, or deals damage to another creature, this spell ends.

effects.special: Warded creature forces attackers to make a Wisdom saving throw or choose a new target/lose the attack or spell.

engineHook.notes: Requires a system to intercept targeting and force a saving throw on the attacker.
